description: Caitlin`s Gothitelle was sent out to battle against Cynthia`s Garchomp as part of a 10 minute exhibition match at the start of the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup opening ceremonies. Cilan noted that the battle was two high quality vintages facing off to each other. During the battle, Cynthia`s Garchomp` Dragon Rush landed a direct hit but Caitlin`s Gothitelle was able to keep its presence of mind and stood up to continue the battle. Freddy that it was an excellent battle and what he expected from an Elite Four members Pokémon and a Champions Pokémon. He couldn`t decide which one was doing the best as they`re both truly beautiful. The exhibition match ended in a draw.
name: Gothiruselle (Cattleya)
